item.title: Unboxing & Setup of the Ledger Nano X
item.description: If you don’t have one yet, you can get it here: Ledger Nano X* What is the Ledger Nano X? As I explained in the article about wallets the Nano X is a cold wallet on which you can securely store your cryptocurrencies. The Nano X is more convenient to use than the Nano S on the go as it has bluetooth capabilities. It has also a bigger capacity than the Nano S.
